text.section: The board may issue, refuse to issue, reissue, or renew a provider approval, or may probate, suspend, or revoke the approval of a provider.
The board shall revoke the approval of a provider while his or her approval is suspended.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 22, effective April 11, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 144, effective July 15, 1998.
